results.content: Greatest teacher I’ve ever seen in my life. Easy to understand him, and his explanations are very easy to understand. He’s know how to teach. VERY RECOMMENDED for people who wanna start learning PHP.

results.content:
I was not really looking for a beginners course, more of a refresher course and did not see the for beginners.  That said I liked this course and would recommend it to a beginner.

I did give one less star because as a course for beginners fundamentals should be stressed.  For example HTML structure is important and some of the markup in the examples are improperly closed out.

Another thing that bothered me a little bit was improperly referencing  when it did not apply.   However, overall it is a nice course.
results.content_html:
I was not really looking for a beginners course, more of a refresher course and did not see the for beginners. That said I liked this course and would recommend it to a beginner.

I did give one less star because as a course for beginners fundamentals should be stressed. For example HTML structure is important and some of the markup in the examples are improperly closed out.

Another thing that bothered me a little bit was improperly referencing when it did not apply. However, overall it is a nice course.

results.content: This is a great PHP tutorial! At the beginning of the tutorial it jumped around a lot from Bootstrap, MySQL and PHP, but the further you get into it, PHP is the main focus as you would expect. I already new the basics of PHP before this tutorial but I learned ALOT after finishing. Great instructor and very thorough explanations!

results.content: It's an awesome course. I like how the instructor start this course. When I've been asked in an interview if I know PDO, I thought that it's a new language and I didn't know that it's a light interface to help communication between computer and database and applying new level of security. I will start the OOP section soon. Great course. Highly recommended.
